languages.text: "Помилуйте, добрые люди! В чем нам каяться? Мы — обычные портовые рабочие. Клянусь ранами Императора, мы закон не нарушем!"
"Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"
languages.original_text: "Помилуйте, добрые люди! В чем нам каяться? Мы — обычные портовые рабочие. Клянусь ранами Императора, мы закон не нарушем!"

traits.locale_text: "Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"
"Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"
"Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"
"Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"
"Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"

languages.text: “够了，善良的人们！我们有什么好忏悔的？我们仅仅是普通的码头工人而已。我以帝皇的伤口发誓，我们绝对没有违背过法律！”
languages.original_text: "Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"

traits.locale_text: “够了，善良的人们！我们有什么好忏悔的？我们仅仅是普通的码头工人而已。我以帝皇的伤口发誓，我们绝对没有违背过法律！”

languages.text: «¡Buenos hombres, por favor! ¿De qué habríamos de arrepentirnos? Somos meros estibadores. ¡Juro por las heridas del Emperador que no hemos infringido ninguna ley!».
languages.original_text: "Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Buenos hombres, por favor! ¿De qué habríamos de arrepentirnos? Somos meros estibadores. ¡Juro por las heridas del Emperador que no hemos infringido ninguna ley!».

languages.text: 「善良なお方、ご勘弁を！悔い改めることなんてありません。我々はただのドック作業員です。皇帝の傷に誓って、法律を冒すことはしていません！」
languages.original_text: "Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"

traits.locale_text: 「善良なお方、ご勘弁を！悔い改めることなんてありません。我々はただのドック作業員です。皇帝の傷に誓って、法律を冒すことはしていません！」

languages.text: "Gute Leute, bitte! Was sollten wir bereuen? Wir sind einfache Dockarbeiter. Ich schwöre bei den Wunden des Imperator, dass wir keine Gesetzesbrecher sind!"
languages.original_text: "Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"

traits.locale_text: "Gute Leute, bitte! Was sollten wir bereuen? Wir sind einfache Dockarbeiter. Ich schwöre bei den Wunden des Imperator, dass wir keine Gesetzesbrecher sind!"

languages.text: « Braves gens, je vous en prie ! De quel péché pourrait-on bien vouloir se racheter ? On est des travailleurs comme les autres. Je le jure sur les plaies de l'Empereur, on n'enfreint pas la loi ! »
languages.original_text: "Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"

traits.locale_text: « Braves gens, je vous en prie ! De quel péché pourrait-on bien vouloir se racheter ? On est des travailleurs comme les autres. Je le jure sur les plaies de l'Empereur, on n'enfreint pas la loi ! »

languages.text: "Ey ahali, ne olursunuz! Tövbe edeceğimiz bir suçumuz mu var? Liman işçisiyiz biz. İmparator'un yaralarına el basarım ki kanuna karşı gelmeyiz!"
languages.original_text: "Good people, please! What's there to repent of? We're common dock workers. I swear on the Emperor's wounds, we're no lawbreakers!"

traits.locale_text: "Ey ahali, ne olursunuz! Tövbe edeceğimiz bir suçumuz mu var? Liman işçisiyiz biz. İmparator’un yaralarına yemin olsun, kanuna karşı gelmeyiz!"
